summary:
## The Academy Awards (Oscars)

The Oscars are special awards given each year to the best movies and the people who make them. They are given by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences in the United States. The Oscars are like the biggest honor you can get in the movie business. They've been given out since 1929, first on radio, then on TV. The award looks like a golden knight. Other big awards like the Emmys (TV), Tonys (theater), and Grammys (music) are based on the Oscars.
title: Academy Awards
